title: Clear noon, moderate-speed city driving with a bus and a red car.
caption: A white car drives on a city street with a bus and a red car.
context: This clip is from ego vehicle index 1 in the CARLA simulation. Weather is clear (clearNoon). The ego vehicle is almost stopped (average speed â‰ˆ 0.0 m/s). There are 30 braking events or strong decelerations in this window.
description: The white car is driving on a city street with a bus and a red car. There are tall buildings on the side of the road and palm trees. The road is wet and there is a crosswalk in the distance. The traffic light is green.
reasoning: The white car is driving at a moderate speed and following the red car in front of it. The bus is on the left side of the road. The ego vehicle is approaching a crosswalk and slowing down because the traffic light is green. The driver is paying attention to the pedestrians and other vehicles on the road to ensure safe driving.
